title: "velocyto"
---

## Pipeline arguments

nextflow run \
https://github.com/openpipelines-bio/openpipeline.git -r main_build \
-main-script target/nextflow/velocity/velocyto/main.nf \
--help

## Table of arguments

| name            | type         | description                                                                                                  |
|:----------------|:-------------|:-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| --input         | file         | Path to BAM file                                                                                             |
| --transcriptome | file         | Path to GTF file                                                                                             |
| --barcode       | file         | Valid barcodes file, to filter the bam. If --bcfile is not specified all the cell barcodes will be included. |
|                 |              | Cell barcodes should be specified in the bcfile as the 'CB' tag for each read                                |
| --without_umi   | boolean_true | foo                                                                                                          |
| --output        | file         | Velocyto loom file                                                                                           |
| --logic         | string       | The logic to use for the filtering.                                                                          |
